details.brokersummary:
Photos of a very similar unit
Luxury Living at The Dean Discover a condo-style residence in Crown Heights featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, hardwood floors, premium appliances, a large balcony, and stunning city views.
Exceptional Amenities Enjoy a stylish lobby, multiple lounges, a landscaped courtyard with greenhouse, gym, yoga studio, rooftop deck ( coming soon), business lounge, doorman, and laundry on every floor.
Prime Location Just steps from the A/C/S trains and minutes to Manhattan, surrounded by top Brooklyn dining, bars, and cafes. Can reach out if needed a sooner move as well

Available for Immediate Move-In
Welcome to the Penthouse Residence at 431 Columbia Street ? a beautifully crafted three-bedroom, two-bathroom floor-through home that blends modern sophistication with everyday comfort in the heart of Red Hook, Brooklyn.
Be the first to live in this thoughtfully designed space, featuring a private terrace? a rare city retreat offering both open-air tranquility and elevated views.
Inside, every detail has been considered for comfort and convenience. Enjoy Mitsubishi Electric split-system climate control in all bedrooms and the living area, hardwood flooring, modern lighting, ample closet space, and an in-unit LG washer and dryer.
At the heart of the home, the open-concept chef?s kitchen features a full suite of KitchenAid stainless steel appliances, including an electric range, refrigerator, dishwasher, and vented microwave. Rich wood cabinetry, elegant countertops, and a chevron-tiled backsplash complete the modern design with timeless style.
The shared full bathroom, located off the main living area, showcases sleek chrome and brushed metal finishes. The primary suite includes an en-suite bath with a calming, spa-inspired palette and its own temperature control for personalized comfort.
Just steps from Van Brunt Street?s vibrant shops, caf?s, and acclaimed restaurants, this home places you at the center of Red Hook?s creative energy and tight-knit community.

Available for Immediate Move-In

Awesome, renovated big 2-bedroom in Williamsburg right off the Subway!
Oak hardwood floors, high ceilings, and large windows letting in tons of natural light!
- Big bedrooms with closets - Renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances - Elevator, On-Site Super - NO FEE! Only first & security.
Contact ASAP for more info and to schedule a showing! This apartment will not last!
Dec 1 move Small pets welcome No broker fee

Incredible 3 bedroom - right by the park!
- 3 bedrooms - 1 bath - hardwood floors - heat and hot water included
Around the corner from Prospect Park! Pasta Louise, Nighthawk Cinema, Dog Day Afternoon, Fonda, WINNER Cafe, Greenwood Park Bar, etc all nearby. Close to F and G trains for easy transportation.
No broker fee Available 1/1/2026 SMALL pets OK

Beautifully renovated 2br in an elevator building. Has an amazing roof deck with skyline views. Laundry in the building as well. Primo location right off the Morgan stop of the L train. - Elevator- Laundry Room- Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan- Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances- Hardwood floors- Garage under the building - Zip Cars available- Separate enclosed AC/Heating units for each room. Quiet and efficient?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE!Pets OK!note: if you can't see the video please send me a message and I'll send it over.

Huge renovated 2.5br. These have been used at 3brs in the past and each room has a private entrance and window but very little common space. Works a lot better as a large 2br with one of the additional rooms used as common space. You?ll get a sense of the space by seeing the video. If you can?t see it, please see the listing on StreetEasy or text me and I can send it to you. note . the apartment is unfurnished and do not come with bed frames show in photos
This apt is beautifully renovated with: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Windows in all bedrooms plus a small skylight in the living room Heat/AC units in each room allowing you to control temp per room (huge savings on utilities) Laundry in the building Owner will purchase standing closets if needed. Fantastic locations with tons of local spots to enjoy Located 2min walk to L and M train lines in prime Bushwick (myrtle/wyckoff stop of L/M)
Pets ok No broker fee Just 1st and security to move in
Call or text to take a look right away!

Spacious, beautifully renovated Studio with Balcony in Prime Bushwick ? Elevator building with Garage Parking and Laundry!!
Located near Morgan L and Flushing JM, near Maria Hernandez Park and steps from great bars, restaurants and shopping
Please see video on StreetEasy or send me a message and I?ll send to you. Video is of 3B which is identical as 4B is occupied currently until the end of the month.
Features: - Private Balcony!! - Elevator - Laundry Room - Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan - Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances - Installed PVAC units for AC and Heating - Hardwood floors - Garage with Zip Cars - Designated parking spots ($300/mo)
?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE! Contact us now to set up a viewing!

Chic 2 Bedroom / 1bath Apartment with massive private balcony right in the Heart of Bushwick! One large bedroom and one smaller bedroom with a skylight . See video . Second bedroom makes a great office or extra hangout space! Both bedroom fit queen sized beds. Owner will also purchase standing closets if you want. 1min walk to the Dekalb L. 5min to the M train. Featuring:
- Private Balcony - Large Open Living Room - Queen Size Bedrooms - Stainless Steel Appliances - Including Dishwasher - And Microwave! - Laundry in Building - Large windows - Plenty of sunlight! - Elevator - Roof deck - Garage - Zipcar in Garage, yas!
Such a great location, with tons of cafe's, bars and restaurants within a five minute walk! Variety Coffee, Taquiera Cocoyoc, Milk and Pull, The Johnson's, Maria Hernandez Park, and many more!
Just first and security to move in. NO BROKER FEE!!

Chic 2 Bedroom / 1bath Apartment with massive private balcony right in the Heart of Bushwick! Large living room. Owner will also purchase standing closets if you want. 1min walk to the Dekalb L. 5min to the M train.
Featuring: - Large Open Living Room - Queen Size Bedrooms - Stainless Steel Appliances - Including Dishwasher - And Microwave! - Laundry in Building - Large windows - Plenty of sunlight! - Elevator - Roof deck - Garage - Zipcar in Garage, yas!
Such a great location, with tons of cafe's, bars and restaurants within a five minute walk! Variety Coffee, Taquiera Cocoyoc, Milk and Pull, The Johnson's, Maria Hernandez Park, and many more!
Just first and security to move in. NO BROKER FEE!!

Quiet and efficient?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE!Pets OK!note: if you can't see the video please send me a message and I'll send it over.

Can be used as a 2br with small common space in the middle or a large 1br. Private outdoor space. Heat and hot water included! Both room are very large. Custom kitchen with granite countertops, microwave and stainless steel appliances. Large enough for kitchen table and chairs. Large renovated bathroom. Located at Harman right off Knickerbocker Ave. Close to the Knickerbocker M Train or the Dekalb L Train.
Located in the back building away from any street noise. Large shared courtyard for the building. See video on streeteasy or message me and I'll send to you.
Pets ok! $20 application fee Heat and hot water included Sorry, no laundry in the building.
Call or text to set up a viewing right away!

-12/01/203 Move in!!! -No Broker Fee!!!
-Large living room, with windows ?Great sized bedrooms with oversized windows & closets -Everyone gets the good room! ?crazy high ceilings w/ skylights -Hardwood Floors -Central Ac/Heat -Laundry in unit
Apartments show way bigger in person than square pictures allow. Awesome area right off DeKalb L, close to Jefferson. Laundry. Lounge.

Spacious Bushwick Duplex with Backyard 🌿 Beautiful duplex featuring high ceilings, exposed brick, and modern finishes. The open living area flows into a renovated kitchen with a dishwasher, perfect for entertaining. Two bright bedrooms, one with backyard access, plus a versatile lower level with a half bath ? ideal for a home office or lounge.
Amenities: Private backyard ? Dishwasher ? Exposed brick ? High ceilings ? Renovated kitchen ? Half bath ? Great light ? Pet friendly

Modern 2br/1bth at 584 4th Ave- Gowanus
Welcome to 584 4th Ave, a brand-new luxury development in the heart of Gowanus. This spacious 2 bed features floor-to-ceiling windows with sweeping views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and city bridges.
Enjoy premium amenities including:
Elevator
Rooftop with panoramic views
Fitness center
In-unit washer/dryer
Located near Park Slope with easy access to the F, G, D, N, and R trains, this building offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and convenience.
Pets allowed upon approval.
Schedule a tour today!
1 month free

The Baltic Canal ? Modern Living in Boerum Hill
Studios, 1- & 2-BR homes with oversized windows, white oak floors, custom kitchens, spa-style baths, and in-unit or on-site laundry. Select residences offer private balconies or terraces.
Amenities: Bike room, elevator, package room, gym, media room, and multiple outdoor spaces ? deck, garden, patio & panoramic roof deck.
Unbeatable location at the crossroads of Boerum Hill, Gowanus & Park Slope, near Whole Foods, top restaurants, boutique shops & F/G/R trains.
📅 Schedule your tour today and make The Baltic Canal your next home.

Modern 2 Bed / 1 Bath at 584 4th Ave- Gowanus
Welcome to 584 4th Ave, a brand-new luxury development in the heart of Gowanus. This spacious 1-bedroom features floor-to-ceiling windows with sweeping views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and city bridges.
Enjoy premium amenities including:

Rooftop with panoramic views

Located near Park Slope with easy access to the F, G, D, N, and R trains, this building offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and convenience.
Pets allowed upon approval.
Schedule a tour today!

2 Bed / 1 Bath ? 724 5th Ave | Sunset Park
Charming and modern 2BR in a boutique building between South Slope and Greenwood. Features high ceilings, exposed brick, hardwood floors, and a sunny eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a dishwasher.
Perks include:
Rooftop with skyline views
Shared courtyard + lounge
Laundry, bike room, video intercom
Near the N, R, and D trains at 25th St. Pet-friendly (with approval). Roommate matching available.
First month + security to move in. Utilities separate.
Message to schedule a tour!

Experience Brooklyn living at 1010 Pacific St. You?ll find this community in the Prospect Heights area of Brooklyn. Experience a new standard at 1010 Pacific St.
Pacific House offers a collection of Studio, 1 and 2 Bedroom luxury apartments featuring expansive, open- concept layouts, oak floors and contemporary finishes. Residents also enjoy unparalleled access to first-class amenities, including fitness center, dedicated kids? areas, media lounge and bar and an expansive roof top with view of the city. Pacific House is centrally located in the heart of Brooklyn?s trendy prospect park neighborhood, and in close proximity to major transit hubs and an array of local amenities. Nearby shops, restaurants, schools, outdoor parks, neighborhood services, arts and culture are all within easy reach.
